mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_no as userNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc
select a.no, title, contents, hit, reg_date, g_no, o_no, depth, user_no, b.name from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{start}, #{end}
